name: Equinox (itch) (Evil Space Wizard)
description:
Modern Browser Users: Click inside the game window after pressing the "Run Game" button !!!

This fixes an audio issue due to the Autoplay Policy on Chrome and Firefox.

Sweet Moon,
We Approach Our Next Tilt,
And Find Our Seasons in Disarray.

This is my first experience with KorGE!

After thinking about making a game based on beach balls and sandy shores, I didn't think I could make anything unique for this jam.

After a good chunk of thinking, I instead decided to take a more "Second Definition" take on the theme of 

Summer - n. Astronomical:
the period from the summer solstice to the autumnal equinox.

In short, the time between the Summer Solstice and Autumnal Equinox, when the Earth's tilt faces towards the sun.

This game is quite straightforward, just stay adrift and catch the white pods.

All Art and Code by Myself

The Poem is "Summer Stars" by Carl Sandburg, I chose it because I thought it had a similar blended understanding of the theme as I did.
